title: Bust & Value Picks + WR Myths, NFL News - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/26
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason each pick a player they think will be a fantasy bust at their draft position!  Plus, three value picks and a new edition of “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 26th, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (06:55) - Never Not Working - Safety Dance: Top 10 WRs
 (13:40) - NFL News
 (24:00) - Busts
 (25:15) - Julio Jones
 (31:20) - Ja’Marr Chase
 (37:40) - Kenny Golladay
 (40:50) - Values
 (41:00) - Corey Davis
 (45:50) - Curtis Samuel
 (51:35) - Deebo Samuel
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
  
 Head & Shoulders

 Pristine Auction -- Registration Code - BALLERS
 Support this podcast 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
